chunk:
Miss Spa Coarse Correct Blemish Banishing Serum (2020 formulation)

Brand: Miss Spa

Category: Serums & Essences
book: 1486-Miss Spa Coarse Correct Blemish Banishing Serum (2020 formulation)

chunk: Ingredients: WATER (AQUA), ALOE BARBADENSIS LEAF JUICE, GLYCERIN, CARRAGEENAN, PROPANEDIOL, SCUTELLARIA BAICALENSIS ROOT EXTRACT, GLYCOSYL TREHALOSE, HYDROGENATED STARCH HYDROLYSATE, CARBOMER, PHENOXYETHANOL, HYDROXYACETOPHENONE, GLYCOPROTEINS, DIPOTASSIUM GLYCYRRHIZATE, POTASSIUM AZELOYL DIGLYCINATE, SODIUM HYALURONATE, ACETYL TETRAPEPTIDE-15.
book: 1486-Miss Spa Coarse Correct Blemish Banishing Serum (2020 formulation)

chunk:
Directions: Apply to clean, dry skin. Use once a day, AM or PM. Follow with normal skincare routine.

Ingredient concerns: MODERATE: Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
book: 1486-Miss Spa Coarse Correct Blemish Banishing Serum (2020 formulation)
